    Class
    Description
    class 
    CompleteAppointmentView
    The CompleteAppointmentView class is responsible for providing the user interface to complete an appointment.
    class 
    DoctorMenuView
    The DoctorMenuView class provides the user interface for the doctor to interact with the system.
    class 
    PendingRequestView
    The PendingRequestView class provides the user interface for displaying and managing pending appointment requests.
    class 
    ScheduleView
    The ScheduleView class is responsible for displaying a doctor's schedule, including their appointments, both confirmed and scheduled on a specific date.
    class 
    UpdatePatientMedicalRecordView
    The UpdatePatientMedicalRecordView class is responsible for handling user input and displaying options for updating patient medical records, including adding prescriptions, adding or setting consultation notes, and handling appointment records.

  • Uses of View in hms.boundary.patient

    Subclasses of View in hms.boundary.patient
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AvailabilityView
    The AvailabilityView class is responsible for displaying a doctor's available appointment slots for a given date.
    class 
    PatientMenuView
    The PatientMenuView class represents the interface for a patient's menu, allowing them to navigate through various options such as viewing medical records, updating information, scheduling appointments, and logging out.
    class 
    UpdatePersonalInfoView
    The UpdatePersonalInfoView class handles the interface for patients to update their personal information, such as phone number and email address.

    The MedicalRecordView class displays the medical record of a given patient, including personal details and appointment outcome records.
